title: The Innocent condemned

description: Episode number 12 of Series "Jesus of Nazareth". The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the garden of Gethsemane, Jesus talks to the Father; Judas betrays Jesus with a kiss; Jesus is arrested and taken away; Judas is given his money by Zerah; Jesus is taken before the high priest and questioned; Caiaphas is outraged by his answers; Peter denies Jesus three times; Judas is found hanged; Jesus is questioned by Pontius Pilate; Jesus is whipped by the soldiers; Jesus is mocked and crowned with thorns.
related_objects: Series; S01277; Jesus of Nazareth; Active; 1977
